title: Enhance button animations and Integrations section with premium smooth interactions

requirements.summary: Apply smooth transition animations to all buttons across the website with 'transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out' to eliminate instant or harsh movement
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons have transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out applied
No buttons exhibit instant state changes
Transition applies to hover, focus, and active states

file_operations.description: Add global button transition styles by modifying the existing .premium-btn class to include 'transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out' and ensure all button selectors inherit this smooth transition property for hover, focus, and active states

requirements.summary: Add hover animations to all buttons with slight scale effect (scale: 1.05), smooth neon glow increase, background brightness transition, and soft responsive cursor interaction
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons scale to 1.05 on hover with smooth transition
Neon glow intensity increases smoothly on hover
Background brightness transitions smoothly
Cursor interaction feels fluid without lag

file_operations.description: Enhance hover state styles for all button classes by adding 'transform: scale(1.05)', increasing box-shadow intensity for neon glow, and applying filter brightness adjustments to create a premium hover experience

requirements.summary: Implement click interaction with subtle press effect that scales down to 0.96 on click and bounces back smoothly, preventing sudden jumps or lag
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons scale down to 0.96 when clicked or pressed
Scale returns smoothly to original size after release
No visual jumps or layout shifts occur
Press effect works on both mouse click and touch

file_operations.description: Add active state styles for all button classes with 'transform: scale(0.96)' to create a press-down effect that smoothly bounces back, ensuring the transition property handles the return animation

requirements.summary: Optimize button motion quality using cubic-bezier or ease-out animation curves, enable GPU acceleration using only transform and opacity animations, and avoid layout shifting animations
acceptanceCriteria: All button animations use cubic-bezier or ease-out timing functions
Animations only modify transform and opacity properties
No layout shifts occur during button animations
GPU acceleration is enabled via transform properties

file_operations.description: Replace existing button transition timing with 'transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1), opacity 0.3s ease-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-out' to optimize for GPU acceleration and prevent layout shifts, ensuring only transform and opacity are animated for button interactions

requirements.summary: Optimize button glow effects so neon glow smoothly fades in and out without flickering or sharp changes
acceptanceCriteria: Glow effects fade in and out smoothly
No flickering or abrupt glow changes occur
Glow transitions match button transition timing

file_operations.description: Update box-shadow transitions for all button glow effects to use 'box-shadow 0.3s ease-out' timing to ensure smooth fade in/out without flickering, matching the overall button transition duration

requirements.summary: Enable smooth scrolling across the entire website, implement smooth section transitions while navigating, and reduce animation jitter or frame drops
acceptanceCriteria: Smooth scrolling is enabled globally on the website
Navigation between sections transitions smoothly
No visible jitter or frame drops during scrolling or transitions
Scroll behavior is consistent across all browsers

file_operations.description: Add global smooth scrolling by including 'html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }' and ensure all scroll-linked animations use 'will-change: transform' for GPU acceleration to reduce jitter and frame drops

requirements.summary: Optimize all button animations for 60fps performance, prevent heavy shadow or blur effects from causing lag, and ensure fast response on mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: All button animations run at consistent 60fps
Shadow and blur effects do not cause performance degradation
Button interactions respond instantly on mobile devices
Performance profiling shows no animation bottlenecks

file_operations.description: Optimize button shadow effects by limiting blur radius and spread, add 'will-change: transform' to button classes to hint browser for GPU acceleration, and ensure all animated properties are compositor-friendly (transform, opacity) for 60fps performance

requirements.summary: Ensure buttons on mobile respond instantly to touch with no delay after tap and maintain smooth animation timing
acceptanceCriteria: Touch interactions trigger button animations immediately
No 300ms tap delay is present on mobile devices
Animation timing is consistent between desktop and mobile
Touch feedback feels responsive and premium

file_operations.description: Add 'touch-action: manipulation' to all button classes to eliminate 300ms tap delay on mobile devices, ensuring instant touch response while maintaining smooth animation timing
Add viewport meta tag with 'user-scalable=no' or ensure touch-action is properly configured to eliminate mobile tap delays for button interactions

requirements.summary: Add section entry animation to the Integrations section that fades in content smoothly with slight upward motion (translateY 30px to 0) over 0.6-0.8 seconds using smooth ease-out transition when the section enters viewport
acceptanceCriteria: Integrations section content fades in when entering viewport
Content moves upward from translateY(30px) to 0
Animation duration is between 0.6 and 0.8 seconds
Ease-out timing function is applied
Animation triggers only once when scrolling into view

file_operations.description: Add intersection observer using the useIntersectionObserver hook to detect when the section enters viewport, apply initial styles 'opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px)' and transition to 'opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0)' with 0.7s ease-out timing when visible

requirements.summary: Make integration cards or elements in the Integrations section appear sequentially with stagger animation delay of 0.1s between items and add soft scale-in effect from 0.95 to 1
acceptanceCriteria: Integration items animate in sequentially, not all at once
Each subsequent item has 0.1s additional delay
Items scale from 0.95 to 1 during entrance
Scale animation is smooth and subtle

file_operations.description: Apply staggered animation delays to each integration logo/card by calculating delay as (index * 0.1s), set initial state 'opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.95)' and animate to 'opacity: 1; transform: scale(1)' when section is visible

requirements.summary: Add hover interaction to integration cards that slightly lifts them upward, adds neon border glow on hover, creates smooth shadow expansion, and scales to 1.03 for premium feel
acceptanceCriteria: Cards translate upward on hover using transform
Neon border glow appears smoothly on hover
Shadow expands smoothly during hover transition
Cards scale to 1.03 on hover
All hover effects transition smoothly together

file_operations.description: Add hover styles to integration items with 'transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.03)', enhanced box-shadow for neon glow, and border color transition, ensuring all properties use smooth 0.3s ease-out transitions
Add integration card hover styles to support the IntegrationsSection component with neon glow utilities and shadow expansion effects

requirements.summary: Add subtle floating motion to integration icons with very slow up-down animation loop and glow intensity that slightly pulses
acceptanceCriteria: Integration icons move up and down in a continuous loop
Floating motion is subtle and slow
Glow intensity pulses gently in sync or independently
Animation loops indefinitely without jarring resets

file_operations.description: Create keyframe animations 'float' with translateY oscillating between -10px and 10px over 4-6 seconds, and 'pulse-glow' with box-shadow intensity varying over 3-4 seconds, both using ease-in-out timing
Apply 'animation: float 5s ease-in-out infinite, pulse-glow 3.5s ease-in-out infinite' to integration icon elements with staggered animation delays to create organic, non-synchronized motion

requirements.summary: Add soft animated gradient or moving neon light effect to the Integrations section background, keeping motion minimal and elegant
acceptanceCriteria: Background has subtle animated gradient or moving light effect
Motion is minimal and does not distract from content
Animation is elegant and matches the futuristic theme
Background animation performs smoothly at 60fps

file_operations.description: Create keyframe animation 'gradient-shift' that smoothly transitions background-position over 15-20 seconds for a subtle moving gradient effect, using only transform and opacity for GPU acceleration
Add animated gradient background to the section container using linear-gradient with multiple color stops and 'background-size: 200% 200%', applying the 'gradient-shift' animation for elegant motion

requirements.summary: Ensure all Integrations section animations use only transform and opacity properties, avoid layout shifts, and maintain 60fps performance
acceptanceCriteria: All animations modify only transform and opacity
No layout shifts occur during any animation
Animations run consistently at 60fps
GPU acceleration is leveraged via transform usage

file_operations.description: Audit all animation styles in the component to ensure only transform and opacity properties are animated, add 'will-change: transform, opacity' to animated elements, and verify no width/height/margin animations cause layout shifts

requirements.summary: Reduce animation intensity on mobile devices for the Integrations section while maintaining smooth appearance without lag
acceptanceCriteria: Animation effects are less intense on mobile viewports
Animations remain smooth on mobile devices
No performance lag occurs on phones
User experience remains premium on all devices

file_operations.description: Add media query for mobile viewports (@media (max-width: 768px)) that reduces animation durations, scales, and removes computationally expensive effects like complex shadows and multiple animations for integration elements
Add conditional logic or CSS classes that reduce hover scale from 1.03 to 1.01, disable floating animations, and simplify glow effects on mobile devices using Tailwind responsive utilities
